name: zMahjong Super Solitaire SZY
description:
This is an addictive but touch game. Only 1% of people can finally win the the game! You will enjoy playing it!
-------------------------

This is another Greatest Mahjong Game by Shen!
It is not only challenging and addictive, but makes your brain soft as well!

Youtube Demo
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoHXEGn3uu0c

***Game goal
Clear the board by removing three same tiles each time as quickly as possible.

***How to remove
* Move maximum one time for each direction.
* Move until two pairs are at same line with no tiles between them.

***Others
* Show End Notification when game has no more pairs
* Show Removing Hints when ending game
* Show Moving Steps when selecting hints (when game ends )
* Optional Automatical hint number of times (0-15).


*It supports Chinese, English, Japanese and Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and Swedish.
